data.comment: Bristol City kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Bristol City kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Filip Benkovic is on a sub for Nathan Baker for Bristol City.
Harry Arter for Fulham has been booked by David Coote and receives a first yellow card.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Fulham kick-off.
Denis Odoi (Fulham) has received a first yellow card.
Pedro Pereira is booked for the home team.
Bristol City make their second substitution with Famara Diedhiou replacing Jamie Paterson.
Scott Parker (Fulham) is making a first substitution, with Neeskens Kebano replacing Ivan Cavaleiro.
Nahki Wells scores to make it 1-0 at Ashton Gate.
Filip Benkovic (Bristol City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team replace Tim Ream with Anthony Knockaert.
Goal! Tom Cairney equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
David Coote blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Niclas Eliasson is replacing Nahki Wells for Bristol City at Ashton Gate.
